front.title: Simple Two-Way Active Measurement Protocol (STAMP) Extensions for Reflecting STAMP Packet Headers

abstract.t: The Simple Two-Way Active Measurement Protocol (STAMP) and its optional extensions can be used for Edge-To-Edge (E2E) active measurement. In Situ Operations, Administration, and Maintenance (IOAM) data fields can be used for recording and collecting Hop-By- Hop (HBH) and E2E operational and telemetry information. This document extends STAMP to reflect IP headers, IPv6 extension headers, and MPLS Network Action Sub-Stacks for HBH and E2E active measurements, for example, using IOAM data fields.
